Account Officer (Female) Job at Hec Recruit




        
    

        
        Hec Recruit is a full-service HR consulting firm with a unique approach. Since 2020 we have been helping our clients find a job best suited for their skills and interests, and helping local companies locate the best employees.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Account Officer (Female)

Job Location: Victoria Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We're seeking a detail-oriented Account Officer to manage and maintain accurate financial records, ensure compliance with accounting standards, and provide financial insights to support business decisions.
	If you have a strong background in accounting and a passion for numbers, we'd love to hear from you!


Key Responsibilities


	Prepare and review financial statements, accounts, and reports.
	Maintain accurate and up-to-date financial records.
	Ensure compliance with accounting standards, regulatory requirements, and company policies.
	Analyze financial data to identify trends and areas for improvement.
	Provide financial insights and recommendations to support business decisions.
	Collaborate with internal stakeholders, including management and finance teams.


Requirements


	Bachelor's Degree in Accounting or a related field.
	2 - 3 years of experience in accounting or finance.
	Professional certification (e.g., ACCA, ICAN) an advantage.
	Strong knowledge of accounting principles, standards, and regulatory requirements.
	Excellent analytical, communication, and reporting skills.
	Proficiency in accounting software and Microsoft Office.


Salary
N200,000 / Month.

Method of Aplication
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hecrecruitment.hrconsulting@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "YouTube Scriptwriter",
  "description": "HotNaija is a media company with one agenda: To serve the news while its hot.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: YouTube Scriptwriter

Job Location:&nbsp;&nbsp;Nigeria
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are looking for an experienced YouTube scriptwriter with a passion for creating compelling, informative, and engaging documentary and news-style content.
	The ideal candidate will have a minimum of 3 years of experience writing scripts for YouTube channels, particularly in the documentary, news, or educational space.
	You should have a keen understanding of how to craft scripts that captivate and hold the audience&#39;s attention while maintaining a clear and factual narrative.


Key Responsibilities


	Write clear, engaging, and fact-driven scripts for documentary and news-style videos
	Research and analyze complex topics to create informative, accurate, and well-structured content
	Collaborate with video producers, editorsto ensure the script aligns with video direction and objectives
	Adapt to different tones and styles depending on the project (e.g., serious, thought-provoking, or light-hearted)
	Ensure scripts are optimized for YouTube audiences, incorporating SEO best practices
	Meet deadlines and adapt to feedback, making revisions as necessary
	Stay updated on trends, current events, and industry best practices.


Requirements


	Minimum of 3 years of experience writing YouTube scripts, with a focus on documentary or news-style content
	Strong research skills and ability to analyze complex topics
	Proven ability to write in a clear, concise, and engaging manner
	Deep understanding of YouTube&rsquo;s audience and video trends
	Familiarity with YouTube SEO and optimizing scripts for search visibility
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team
	Excellent communication skills and attention to detail.


Preferred Qualifications:


	Previous experience in journalism, documentary production, or news writing
	Knowledge of YouTube video production and how scripts integrate with visuals and pacing
	Ability to write scripts on diverse topics and in various genres.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their cover letter and 2-3 samples of their previous YouTube scripts for documentary or news-style content:&nbsp;contact@hotnaija.com.ng&nbsp;using the Job Position&nbsp; as the subject of the mail.

YouTube Scriptwriter Job at HotNaija




        
    

        
        HotNaija is a media company with one agenda: To serve the news while its hot.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: YouTube Scriptwriter

Job Location:  Nigeria
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are looking for an experienced YouTube scriptwriter with a passion for creating compelling, informative, and engaging documentary and news-style content.
	The ideal candidate will have a minimum of 3 years of experience writing scripts for YouTube channels, particularly in the documentary, news, or educational space.
	You should have a keen understanding of how to craft scripts that captivate and hold the audience's attention while maintaining a clear and factual narrative.


Key Responsibilities


	Write clear, engaging, and fact-driven scripts for documentary and news-style videos
	Research and analyze complex topics to create informative, accurate, and well-structured content
	Collaborate with video producers, editorsto ensure the script aligns with video direction and objectives
	Adapt to different tones and styles depending on the project (e.g., serious, thought-provoking, or light-hearted)
	Ensure scripts are optimized for YouTube audiences, incorporating SEO best practices
	Meet deadlines and adapt to feedback, making revisions as necessary
	Stay updated on trends, current events, and industry best practices.


Requirements


	Minimum of 3 years of experience writing YouTube scripts, with a focus on documentary or news-style content
	Strong research skills and ability to analyze complex topics
	Proven ability to write in a clear, concise, and engaging manner
	Deep understanding of YouTube’s audience and video trends
	Familiarity with YouTube SEO and optimizing scripts for search visibility
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team
	Excellent communication skills and attention to detail.


Preferred Qualifications:


	Previous experience in journalism, documentary production, or news writing
	Knowledge of YouTube video production and how scripts integrate with visuals and pacing
	Ability to write scripts on diverse topics and in various genres.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their cover letter and 2-3 samples of their previous YouTube scripts for documentary or news-style content: contact@hotnaija.com.ng using the Job Position  as the subject of the mail.

Note: We’re excited to see how you can contribute to our team and bring engaging stories to our audience!.

Front Desk Officer Job at Motomedia




        
    

        
        Motomedia is an innovative outdoor advertising company with a proven track record in developing and delivering successful OOH campaigns across Africa by infusing Data-driven technology in whatever we do from planning to execution and reporting. We are Africa’s number 1 fastest-growing outdoor agency because we understand one thing only -bridging the gap between audiences and brands. We are a team of professionals and setting the standard within the outdoor advertising space is our hobby and that’s why to date our portfolio of clients cuts across every sector. Over the last decade, we have expanded our operations across Africa.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Front Desk Officer
     

            
    



Job Location: Maryland, Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a professional and courteous Front Desk Officer to serve as the first point of contact for our organization.
	The ideal candidate will manage front desk activities, provide administrative support across departments, and ensure all visitors and clients are attended to promptly and professionally.


Key Responsibilities


	Greet and welcome visitors in a friendly and professional manner.
	Manage incoming calls, redirecting them appropriately or taking messages.
	Maintain the reception area to ensure it is tidy and presentable.
	Receive, sort, and distribute daily mail, packages, and deliveries.
	Coordinate with other departments for internal and external communications.
	Handle inquiries and resolve minor complaints from clients or visitors.
	Schedule appointments and manage meeting room bookings.
	Maintain a visitor log and ensure security procedures are followed.
	Assist with clerical tasks such as filing, data entry, photocopying, and correspondence.
	Support HR and Admin departments with basic documentation and logistics as needed.


Requirements


	Minimum of OND/HND/Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration or related field.
	4-6 years of proven experience in a similar front desk or administrative role.
	Highly Proficient with the use of Excel and PowerPoint (Mandatory)
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
	Strong organizational and multitasking abilities.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, Outlook).
	Ability to remain calm and courteous in fast-paced environments.
	Neat appearance and professional attitude.


Salary
N150,000 - N200,000 / Month.
